name: Live Math Competitions and League
shortDescription: A mental math app that offers practice and live competitions, allowing users to showcase their skills on an international level.
fullDescription:
Live Math Competitions and League is a dedicated platform for mental math practice and competition. It is designed to help users, from novices to seasoned math champions, improve their arithmetic skills in a gamified and interactive environment. The app caters to all ages and educational backgrounds, covering a wide range of topics.

Key Game Modes:

  • Practice Levels: Users can choose from three difficulty levels (Challenger, Master, Grandmaster), each with 10 rounds of increasing difficulty. Clearing a level earns a cool badge (Bronze, Silver, or Golden).
  • 1 vs 1: A head-to-head multiplayer clash where users bet a fixed number of coins. You can challenge Facebook friends, a random player, or the in-house bot Mathador.
  • Leagues and Events:
    • Leagues: Create and invite friends to fight in teams of 2 to win points and a Ruby Badge.
    • Events: Solo competition mode where you get 3 attempts in 24 hours to win the event and earn an Emerald Badge.

Topics Covered:

Includes Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, BODMAS, Percentages, Average, Ratios, Decimals, HCF & LCM, Factors, Exponents, and many more.
